overview: Shane Diesel has brought along some of the homies for this special episode, and yea, they're fuckin' huge too! Crissy Moon gets her crater cracked and packed full of Ramon's monster meat. Makali Chanel get her shit ripped up by Ice Cold. Jennifer Dark goes insane when Justin Long rams her with the big night train. Leighlani Red gets pounded when Sledge Hammer rips her a new one. And Bailey Brooks gets a taste of Shane Diesel and his 10 lb. cock sausage. If only they knew... that these guys aren't just big... they're huge!
title: It's huge! 13
